com.viaoa.util.converter
Class OAConverterTime

java.lang.Object
  com.viaoa.util.converter.OAConverterTime
All Implemented Interfaces:
OAConverterInterface
public class OAConverterTime
extends java.lang.Object
implements OAConverterInterface

Convert to/from a Time value.

    Converting the following to a Date
  • String, using optional format for parsing.
  • OADateTime
  • Date
  • All others value will return null.

    Converts a Time to any of the following
  • String, using an optional format.

See Also:
OAConverter, OADateTime, OATime
